    • updateStatus

      public boolean updateStatus(org.bson.types.ObjectId id, Referencing referencing)
      Update the status of a referencing thanks to its startDate and endDate, with the values "Passé", "En cours" and "A venir"
      Parameters:
      id - The id of the referencing.
      referencing - The referencing.
      Returns:
      A list of referencings.

    • getDao

      protected ReferencingMongoDao getDao()
      Description copied from class: AbstractController
      Get the DAO used by the specific controller in order to call its DAO methods. Should be the DAO which manage the entity managed by the controller.
      Specified by:
      getDao in class AbstractController<Referencing>
      Returns:
      the DAO of the specific Controller (ReferencingDao).
